title: Thin Crust Pizza Dough

preparations.content: Lightly grease a large bowl and set aside.

Place water, flour, semolina, yeast and salt into mixing bowl and knead <b>2 min/<b>. Form dough into a ball and transfer into prepared bowl. Cover with cling wrap and let dough rise until doubled in size (approx. 1 hr.). Use as needed.

hintsAndTricks: To test for proofing: put a small ball of dough in a glass of water and when it rises to the top the dough has finished proofing. Use pizza dough as required by recipe.

Makes two 14 inch, three 12 inch or four individual 9 inch round pizzas.
To shape pizza, place dough on oiled pizza pan or a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Press it out from the center to the edges with your fingertips, and gently stretch into shape. Let rest 5 minutes. Add favorite sauce and toppings and bake 10-15 minutes (500°F) until crispy and golden.
